alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 23 at 12:21AM MST until November 23 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 65 MPH possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and adjacent Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. * WHEN...5 AM until 2 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
